images.copyright: Moss pink displays at Hitsujiyama Park, Saitama Prefecture, Japan (© Takashi Images/Shutterstock)
images.title: Pretty in pink
images.caption: Hitsujiyama Park, Saitama Prefecture, Japan
images.desc: Phlox subulata is known by many names. While some call it moss pink, others call it creeping phlox, flowering moss, or mountain phlox. No matter what name you know it by, you cannot deny the beauty and charm of these tiny perennial flowers. They bloom in spring and add bright splashes of color wherever they grow.
